title: Minimum Distance to Avoid Hitting a Couch
stem: You are driving down a road at 50 mph and see a couch on the road that has fallen off a truck. You slam on the brakes decelerating the car at its maximum braking deceleration of 31 ft/sÂ². What's the minimum distance (in feet) that the couch can be so that you can avoid hitting the couch.
prereqs: Understanding of kinematics and deceleration equations
